name: Forza Horizon 3: Blizzard Mountain
summary: The Blizzard Mountain expansion for Forza Horizon 3 brings snow, ice, extreme elevations, and blizzards to challenge players in their quest to become King of the Mountain. Explore this extreme alpine playground in eight new cars and trucks including the 2016 Ford GYMKHANA 9 Focus RS RX. Compete in thrilling new mountain race events like Hill Climb, Descent, and Blizzard Races. Discover new Bucket List Blueprints, Rivals events, Xbox Live Achievements, a new barn find car, and more. This add-on is available separately, or as part of the Forza Horizon 3 Expansion Pass.
